author: AuroraPerego
body:
#### PR description:

This fixes a crash seen in #44785 in the code for the electron isolation in the MTD Validation.
The reason for the crash is the assumption that the electron always has a mother, which is not true for electrons from particle gun. A check that the mother exists has been added.

A small fix in the computation of the isolation using the sim information has been added as well.

#### PR validation:

workflow 24891.0 was crashing before (event 20) and now runs fine
title: fix in MTD electron isolation
